title: Pogačar’s Former Teammate Reveals Why World No. 1 Used Rim Brakes for So Long
content:
Pogačar was one of the last holdouts in switch to disc: ‘There was pressure from Colnago to race on disc brake bikes.’

Read the full article at Pogačar’s Former Teammate Reveals Why World No. 1 Used Rim Brakes for So Long on Velo.
